title: Is there a point to continue? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a point to continue, it just may seem like you aren’t there yet. I’m not going to act like I care, but I am typing right now so I hope that counts for something. I’m not saying “don’t give up”, but all the most important stories and people in my life told me that.

As irritating as it is for a person who is currently trying to figure all this out to hear, there is no objective reason for being. You have to figure it out. Anyone that tells you what the reason for being is, really, is just giving you their reason for being. Is there a point? Sure. There are many potential points. You just have to figure it out.
